# EKSpan.thisEvent

**Case**

Modifications to this event instance should affect only this instance.

## Declaration

```swift
case thisEvent
```

## Constants

- **EKSpan.futureEvents**: Modifications to this event instance should also affect future instances of this event.

items.description: Modifications to this event instance should also affect future instances of this event.
